channel.title: Encoding on Matt Andreko
channel.description: Recent content in Encoding on Matt Andreko

item.title: OverTheWire Natas Level 8
item.description: Level 8 of the OverTheWires Natas wargame was pretty simple, as a developer, but could prove more difficult if you don’t have similar background. It starts out with a secret password input. Like other levels, I looked at the source code to see what was going on in the background. Based on this code, you can see that it has a stored secret value, that is base64 encoded, then reversed, and then converted to a hex string.
